official-title.#text:
To authorize certain Department of Veterans Affairs major
		  medical facility leases, and for other purposes.

committee-name.#tail: , and in addition to the Committee on the

, for a period to

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may carry
			 out the following major medical facility leases in fiscal year 2013 at the
			 locations specified, and in an amount for each lease not to exceed the amount
			 shown for such location:

text.#text: The

header.#text:

			 fiscal year 2013 major medical facility leases

For a clinical

			 $7,280,000.

For a new primary
			 care and dental clinic annex, Charleston, South Carolina, an amount not to
			 exceed $7,070,000.

For the Cobb
			 County Community Based Outpatient Clinic, Cobb County, Georgia, an amount not
			 to exceed $6,409,000.
